title: Collision Box
description: This component can be specified as a Boolean. If this component is omitted, the default value for this component is true, which will give your block the default values for its parameters (a collision box the size/shape of a regular block).

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position of the bounds of the collision box. origin is specified as [x, y, z] and must be in the range (-8, 0, -8) to (8, 16, 8), inclusive.

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the collision box. Size is specified as [x, y, z]. origin + size must be in the range (-8, 0, -8) to (8, 16, 8), inclusive.
